name: Sites Background
description: This element controls the background styling for a given block

elements.helpText: This element controls the background color for this item
elements.label: Background Color

elements.helpText: This element controls if the background image is shown or not
elements.label: Include background image

elements.helpText: This element controls the fill behavior applied to the bakground image
elements.label: Fill

elements.helpText: This element is used to uniquely identify this element in the current content item
elements.label: Key
